topic: hosting a welcome party for all new employees and provide new members good experience in a hybrid way given the ongoing pandemic

steps.content: Establishing the date, time, and platform for the welcome party.
Deciding on the budget for the event.
Finalizing the list of new employees who will be invited.
Deciding on the activities during the party - Ice breaking games, orientation presentation, etc.
Arranging for the technical aspects of a hybrid event, such as video conferencing tools, hybrid-friendly games, troubleshooting during the event.
Planning how to solicit feedback after the event for future improvements.
Strategy for ensuring interaction and engagement between the new and existing employees during the event.
